title: Faewolf
description: Faewolves, like werewolves, can walk among men. What happens when Kiya Whitecloud, a young gay college student in Santa Cruz, wants one of these men enough to risk his heart--and his life? A paranormal m/m erotic romance from Circlet Press, Inc. [ explicit sex, dubious consent, and rough scenes.]
author: D.M. Atkins
